description: This record defines a post on Blue Board

attachment.description: The post's attachment blob. Must be present if parent is dev.ocbwoy3.blueboard.board, otherwise AppView will ignore it.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the post was created

parent.description: Determines the parent of the post. Must either be a `dev.ocbwoy3.blueboard.board` or a `dev.ocbwoy3.blueboard.post`.
